actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to make a technical amendment to the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 so as to include the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico and the District of Columbia as a State for purposes of title IV.

summary.text: Revises the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 so as to include the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico and the District of Columbia with respect to the program of grants for educational research and training as established by such Act.

titles.title: A bill to make a technical amendment to the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 so as to include the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico and the District of Columbia as a State for purposes of title IV.
